attributes.action: call on Archbishop Rowan Williams to resign his post.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Archbishop Williams has time and again proved himself as unsuitable to lead the global Anglican communion. He is more interested in furthering the aims of other religions against the orders of the scriptures, and meddling in the political functions of the UK, which should be permanently seperated from the church.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
